channel.title: CVE Feed for Sourceforge -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sourceforge -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-1010004|2024-08-05T03:07:18.416Z -- sourceforge -- sox%20-%20sound%20exchange
item.description: SoX - Sound eXchange 14.4.2 and earlier is affected by: Out-of-bounds Read. The impact is: Denial of Service. The component is: read_samples function at xa.c:219. The attack vector is: Victim must open specially crafted .xa file. NOTE: this may overlap CVE-2017-18189.
